"Have you noticed the Message Packs scattered across each planet?"
"Our advance scout units document useful information in them and leave them out in the field. If you have a chance, you should take a look at them."
"Reading them is easy. Simply approach and access them."
"Don't neglect your daily training! An ARKS's life is one of endless dedication!"

"A trained body means a healthy soul! When fighting Darkers, the power of your heart is the most important!"
"A trained body means a healthy soul! When fighting Darkers, the power of your heart is the most important!"
"How do I feel about fighting non-Darkers?"
"I see, that's something every ARKS should think about at least once."
"Still, there's nothing to worry about. We never act as invaders."
"We're not allowed to harm, capture or even collect tissue samples from organisms other than those under the influence of Darkers."
"In addition, we conduct extensive forward scouting so that ordinary ARKS are only sent into areas with Darker-afflicted creatures."
"The laser fences and so on around mission areas separate the harmless creatures from the afflicted ones. That's all dealt with well in advance."
"I hear that Dark Falz has revived. Perhaps it's time I came out of retirement as well."
"I might be past my prime, but I have plenty of experience. I'll see you on the battlefield any time you like."

"Our enemies are growing more powerful, but ARKS is evolving day by day. We don't have anything to worry about."
"I've got more than a little power myself, if it's ever needed."

"...I never expected something like this to happen so soon after I returned to active duty."
"...I never expected we'd see so many changes in such a short period of time."
"Of course I know everything changes eventually, but it feels like my eyes are opening to what that really means all over again. I've never seen anything like it."
"As the image of our enemy becomes clearer, I can feel a fire starting to burn inside me."
"I retired from active duty once, but my strength may be of use now."
"I've made my decision. I'm willing to use this power of mine whenever and wherever it's needed."
"A lot of things seem to have happened, but for the time being, all that matter is we're safe."
"There's likely to be a major battle in our future. I might be past my best, but I have a feeling I can make a difference if I go all-out."
"For now, you have work to do. Everyone here is trying to support you. Believe in them, and let that fuel you as you go forward."
"Above all, we've achieved a good result. I was worried that it might be difficult even for you."
"But that was just an old man's pessimism. Watching you fight to shape the future was truly inspiring."
"It made me wonder if I could be like you, even at my age."
"The [Profound Darkness] is a powerful enemy. But we're not helpless against it, even if all we can do is buy ourselves time."
"In this brief peace, we must train ourselves relentlessly so that we're for the day it returns."
"We cannot afford to lose."
"I'm glad to see you back. A veteran warrior returning to the front lines will raise everyone's morale."
"Don't worry about doing anything in particular. Just having you around will give people some peace of mind."
"Vigor comes from action. Your actions energize everyone here."
"Vigor comes from action. The way you take the initiative is what's energizing everyone here."
